alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Cumberland (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 03 at 6:11AM EST until March 04 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Cumberland, Atlantic, Cape May, Atlantic Coastal Cape May and Coastal Atlantic. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 11 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in coastal and bayside communities, and along inland tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Maurice River at Bivalve MLLW Categories - Minor 7.6 ft, Moderate 8.6 ft, Major 9.6 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 03/06 AM 6.0 -0.3 0.7 None 03/07 PM 6.4 0.1 1.5 None 04/06 AM 8.2 1.9 3.0 Minor 04/08 PM 6.0 -0.3 1.0 None 05/08 AM 7.1 0.8 1.3 None 05/08 PM 6.3 0.0 1.1 None Atlantic Ocean at Atlantic City MLLW Categories - Minor 6.0 ft, Moderate 7.0 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.4 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 03/05 AM 4.8 0.2 0.9 None 03/05 PM 4.5 -0.1 1.5 None 04/05 AM 6.8 2.2 2.8 Minor 04/06 PM 4.9 0.3 1.7 None 05/06 AM 5.8 1.2 1.6 None 05/07 PM 4.9 0.3 1.4 None Great Egg Harbor Bay at Ocean City MLLW Categories - Minor 5.3 ft, Moderate 6.3 ft, Major 7.3 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 03/05 AM 4.4 0.4 0.8 None 03/06 PM 4.1 0.1 1.4 None 04/06 AM 5.9 1.9 2.2 Minor 04/07 PM 4.3 0.3 1.4 None 05/07 AM 5.1 1.1 1.2 None 05/07 PM 4.3 0.3 1.1 None Cape May Harbor at Cape May MLLW Categories - Minor 6.2 ft, Moderate 7.2 ft, Major 8.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.1 ft, Moderate 2.1 ft, Major 3.1 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 03/05 AM 5.1 0.0 0.8 None 03/06 PM 5.0 -0.1 1.6 None 04/06 AM 7.1 2.0 2.6 Minor 04/07 PM 4.9 -0.2 1.4 None 05/07 AM 6.1 1.0 1.4 None 05/07 PM 5.2 0.1 1.3 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
